instruction: Generate a three-sentence story based on the given input.
input: A snowman in a dark forest
output: Once upon a time, there was a snowman in a dark and mysterious forest. He was alone and scared, but he was also excited about exploring this new place. As he ventured further and further into the forest, he became more and more upbeat and happy. He soon discovered a family of rabbits living in the forest, and he became friends with them.
